const intervalId=setInterval(()=>{setAdIndex(prevAdIndex=>(prevAdIndex+1)%adImages.length);},8000);return()=>clearInterval(intervalId);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GlobalStyle,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FrameLayout,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(VertNavBar,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceNavItem,{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('education'),active:activeCategory==='education',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:education,alt:"Education",style:{width:'35px',height:'35px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceNavItem,{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('work'),active:activeCategory==='work',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:work,alt:"Work",style:{width:'35px',height:'35px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceNavItem,{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('volunteering'),active:activeCategory==='volunteering',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:volunteering,alt:"Volunteering",style:{width:'35px',height:'35px'}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ExperienceNavItem,{onClick:()=>setActiveCategory('achievements'),active:activeCategory==='achievements',children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:achievements,alt:"Achievements",style:{width:'35px',height:'35px'}})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainContainer,{children:renderExperiences()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdContainer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:adImages[adIndex],alt:"Advertisement",style:{width:'auto',height:'1080px',borderRadius:'15px'}})})]})]});}export default ExperiencesPage;
